modules.description: Creates and manages a data structure for building QR code input. Accepts mode-specific strings and returns the number of encoded bytes. Used to construct binary data for QR encoding by appending text segments with defined encoding modes.

Encodes QR input data into a structured QRcode representation using the encode function. Renders the encoded data as a PNG image with specified dimensions and margin, saving it to a given file path. Operates on QRinput.t for input and produces a t type for internal representation.

Encodes a string into a formatted output with customizable size and margin. It processes raw text and applies layout parameters to generate structured results. Used to prepare textual data for display in constrained or styled environments.

Encodes binary data into QR codes using a grid-based representation, supporting error correction levels and size adjustments. Operates on byte arrays and integers to generate structured output. Used to create scannable codes for URL sharing and data embedding in physical media.

Encodes text into QR codes using mode-specific data structures, handling numeric, alphanumeric, 8-bit, and Kanji encodings, and returns byte counts for internal processing. Transforms structured input into a QRcode representation, generating PNG images with defined dimensions and margins. Processes raw text into formatted outputs, applying layout parameters for display in constrained spaces. Supports creating, encoding, and rendering QR codes with customizable visual and structural properties.
